| HistoryText             = Much like [[Purifiers (Earth-616)|their similarly named counterparts on Earth]], the Purifiers are agents of the Skrull Empire who weed out mutant Skrulls (“K-class Deviants”).  A team of Purifiers were opposed by Cadre K, an X-Men like team of mutant Skrulls organized by Professor X, on the planet Carpiax IV, where the ruling governor Lord Merrek’s fecundity-supplement programs apparently resulted in a higher percentage of mutant births.
